content: m i r a s c o w l a combination of knit and purl stitches makes this cowl an elegant classic m a t e r i a l s y a r n 1 skein baah la jolla or baah private collection used in sample n e e d l e s 24 or 32 us 7 circular needles stitch marker g a u g e 16 sts = 4inches after blocking s i z e cowl infinity sample shown d i r e c t i o n s cast on 120 180 stitches join in the round being careful not to twist stitches place a marker to mark the beginning of round round 1 k2 p4 k8 p16 k16 p8 k4 p2 repeat to end of round repeat round 1 to desired height or until you reach the end of your yarn leaving enough yarn to bind off bind off bind off loosely in pattern knit the knits and purl the purls for a loose bind off i suggest using jenny s magic bind off block aggressively stretching fabric to get a light weight fabric ©mira cole 2011
